com.baypackets.ase.sbb
Interface ConferenceRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConferenceRegistry
public interface ConferenceRegistry

Conference Registry interface can be used to find the conference controller using the conference id. By default a conference registry object would be available as an attribute in the Servlet Context with the name "com.baypackets.ase.sbb.ConferenceRegistry" If the application want to use a different conference registry implementation, it should create and add it to the Servlet Context as an attribute with the name "com.baypackets.ase.sbb.ConferenceRegistry" during the initialization.

Method Detail

findByConferenceID

public ConferenceInfo findByConferenceID(java.lang.String confId)
This method returns the Conference Info for the specified Conference

Parameters:
confId - - Conference Identifier.
Returns:
The Conference Info associated with this conference. NULL if the conference is not registered with this registry.

registerConference

public void registerConference(ConferenceInfo info)
Registers the Conference into this registry.

Parameters:
info - Conference Info object.

unregisterConference

public void unregisterConference(java.lang.String conferenceId)
Unregisters the conference specified by this conference Identifier.

Parameters:
conferenceId - Conference Identifier.

isMatchingRequest

public boolean isMatchingRequest(java.lang.String conferenceId,
 javax.servlet.sip.SipServletMessage message)
Returns whether or not this request/response belongs to the conference as specified by the conference identifier.

Parameters:
conferenceId - The Conference Identifier
message - SIP Servlet Message
Returns:
true if the conference is registered with this registry and the message belongs to this conference session, false otherwise

getConferenceURI

public java.lang.String getConferenceURI(java.lang.String conferenceId)
Returns the URI for the conference specified by the Identifier.

Parameters:
conferenceId - The Conference Identifier.
Returns:
Conference URI if the conference is registered with this registry.
